job_details.Vacaturetitel: Software Engineer with Gen AI Expertise
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Our engineering team operates in independent tribes, ensuring flat hierarchies and scalability. Each tribe is self-sufficient with full ownership of its area. Developers enjoy a lot of freedom: they choose missions to work on, and after completing a mission, they return to the launchpad to recover and prepare for the next one.
   The technologies we use:
   Front End - React.js and Next.js
   Back End - Node.js, Typescript with some PHP and Golang
   Gen AI - LLMs (SaaS and self-hosted)
   Other - MySQL, CouchDB, Redis, ElasticSearch, RabbitMQ and Kafka

   Your new adventure:
     * Work independently in a team and deliver high-quality code in a timely manner
     * Ensure that our AI platform and features are fast, reliable, and scale effectively as we continue to grow and enhance the AI user experience for all customers
     * Utilize techniques such as prompt engineering, embeddings, and tool/function calling to develop innovative solutions with generative AI
     * Work closely with product designers to create intuitive interfaces for our in-app AI assistant, ensuring a great experience for our users
     * Collaborate with machine learning engineers to develop and implement advanced ML models that drive our AI-powered features
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer with Gen AI Expertise

Our engineering team operates in independent tribes, ensuring flat hierarchies and scalability. Each tribe is self-sufficient with full ownership of its area. Developers enjoy a lot of freedom: they choose missions to work on, and after completing a mission, they return to the launchpad to recover and prepare for the next one.
   The technologies we use:
   Front End - React.js and Next.js
   Back End - Node.js, Typescript with some PHP and Golang
   Gen AI - LLMs (SaaS and self-hosted)
   Other - MySQL, CouchDB, Redis, ElasticSearch, RabbitMQ and Kafka

   Your new adventure:
     * Work independently in a team and deliver high-quality code in a timely manner
     * Ensure that our AI platform and features are fast, reliable, and scale effectively as we continue to grow and enhance the AI user experience for all customers
     * Utilize techniques such as prompt engineering, embeddings, and tool/function calling to develop innovative solutions with generative AI
     * Work closely with product designers to create intuitive interfaces for our in-app AI assistant, ensuring a great experience for our users
     * Collaborate with machine learning engineers to develop and implement advanced ML models that drive our AI-powered features

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the use of Generative AI technologies, including LLMs, prompt engineering, embeddings, and tool/function calling. It also highlights building and enhancing AI user experiences, developing features with generative AI, and collaborating with ML engineers on AI-powered features. This aligns directly with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in designing, developing, and deploying applications built on top of large language models and focusing on user-facing software systems.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Work independently in a team and deliver high-quality code in a timely manner', 'ensure that our AI platform and features are fast, reliable, and scale effectively', and 'Work closely with product designers to create intuitive interfaces for our in-app AI assistant, ensuring a great experience for our users'. These indicate traditional software engineering practices for building and maintaining user-facing applications.
job_tasks.phrase: deliver high-quality code in a timely manner

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'ensure that our AI platform and features are fast, reliable, and scale effectively as we continue to grow and enhance the AI user experience for all customers' points to the need for robust and scalable software development for AI features.
job_tasks.phrase: ensure that our AI platform and features are fast, reliable, and scale effectively

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'Utilize techniques such as prompt engineering, embeddings, and tool/function calling to develop innovative solutions with generative AI', which are core activities in developing and adapting generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: prompt engineering, embeddings, and tool/function calling

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'develop innovative solutions with generative AI' directly relates to the creation and adaptation of generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: develop innovative solutions with generative AI

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Work closely with product designers to create intuitive interfaces for our in-app AI assistant, ensuring a great experience for our users' highlights the software development aspect of creating user-facing applications.
job_tasks.phrase: create intuitive interfaces for our in-app AI assistant

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'Collaborate with machine learning engineers to develop and implement advanced ML models that drive our AI-powered features' indicates involvement in the development and implementation of ML models.
job_tasks.phrase: develop and implement advanced ML models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'ensure that our AI platform and features are fast, reliable, and scale effectively' implies a need for operational considerations in deploying and maintaining AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: ensure that our AI platform and features are fast, reliable, and scale effectively
